ModMetaData.name: Vengeful Dead
ModMetaData.author: RedMattis
ModMetaData.description:
Highly Configurable Undying Disaster
The returned are primarily meant to model the kind of "Vengeful Revenant" type of undead rather than the brain-eating zombie variety.
You absolutely can combine this with Zombieland. The Returned from this mod will be ignored by the zombies, and those about to turn into Returned will not rise as zombies.
